Posts.Content: If you are not going to do chemo what are your plans in addressing the cancer. There are alternatives.
Posts.Title: BREAST CANCER

Posts.Content:
Curcumin is good for inflamation but not sure how effective it is in fighting cancer. There is evidence showing B-17 is effective in fighting cancer. Some people use bitter apricot seeds to fight cancer.
http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=QZHk_4B5JD8
Posts.Title: Curcumin - Recurrent Breast Cancer

Posts.Content: I noticed an article discussing the use of curcumin in fighting cancer. One thing important to remember is curcumin is fat soluable meaning it needs to be put in fat in order for the body to absorb it.
Posts.Title: Curcumin - Recurrent Breast Cancer
